Detailed Description

gradients of matrix elements that that depend on the expectation values of Center of Mass coordinate and momentum

(c) 2003 Thomas Neff

Definition in file gradCMSlaterDet.h.

References SlaterDet::A, gcmpara::A, calcSlaterDetOBME(), gob_dcm(), SlaterDet::N, gcmpara::N, OneBodyOperator::opt, par, gcmpara::V, gcmpara::X, SlaterDet::Z, and gcmpara::Z.

Referenced by calcgradConstraintED2(), calcgradConstraintEO2(), calcgradConstraintEQ2(), calcgradConstraintJ2(), calcgradConstraintJ2(), calcgradConstraintl2(), calcgradConstraintls(), calcgradConstraintLS(), calcgradConstraintNO2(), calcgradConstraintNQ2(), and calcgradConstraintO2().

{
  int i;
  double dcm[6];
  calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, op, dcm);

  gcmpara para;
  para.A = Q->A; para.Z = Q->Z; para.N = Q->N;
  for (i=0; i<3; i++)
    para.X[i] = dcm[i];
  for (i=0; i<3; i++)
    para.V[i] = dcm[i+3];

  gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_dcm = {opt: op->opt, par: &para, me: gob_dcm}; 

  calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_dcm, grad);
}
